metadata.name: vibes-cli
metadata.description: A CLI tool to convert raw human requirements into AI-consumable structured specifications.
metadata.author: AI + Human Collaboration

core: Processing: Analyze and structure into standardized JSON spec.
Output: AI-consumable JSON with explicit fields for UI, logic, and constraints.
CLI should support both interactive and non-interactive modes.
optional: Integrate with OpenAPI or AI model configs.

input.description: Raw natural language describing feature or product requirement.

examples.input_example: User wants a dashboard that shows real-time sales and traffic data.

output_example.title: Real-Time Sales Dashboard
output_example.description: A dashboard for monitoring sales and traffic in real-time.
output_example.intent: Build frontend UI and backend API integration for real-time analytics.
output_example.ai_guidance: Focus on modular components and real-time data streaming efficiency.

future: Connect with AI model for auto-prompt generation
Export spec to project scaffolding tool
